  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1913</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Magic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Magie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mágica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Magia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγικός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Magia</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online internet activity for intermmediate English students, where the student learns how to do magic tricks , answers questions aboutthem and learn to perform some tricksthemselves</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">foods</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Magic</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Internet-Online-Dienst für intermmediate 
englische Kursteilnehmer, in denen der Kursteilnehmer erlernt, wie zu 
magische Tricks tun Sie, beantwortet Fragen aboutthem und erlernt, 
etwas tricksthemselves durchzuführen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité en ligne d'Internet pour les 
étudiants anglais d'intermmediate, où l'étudiant apprend comment à
faites les tours magiques, répond à l'aboutthem de questions et 
apprend à exécuter quelques tricksthemselves</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade em linha do Internet para os 
estudantes ingleses do intermmediate, onde o estudante aprende como a 
faça truques mágicos, responde ao aboutthem das perguntas e 
aprende-o executar alguns tricksthemselves</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività in linea del Internet per gli allievi 
inglesi del intermmediate, in cui l'allievo impara come a faccia i 
trucchi magici, risponde al aboutthem di domande ed impara effettuare 
alcuni tricksthemselves</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση δραστηριότητα Διαδικτύου για 
τους αγγλικούς σπουδαστές intermmediate, όπου ο σπουδαστής 
μαθαίνει πώς να κάνει τα μαγικά τεχνάσματα, απαντά στις 
ερωτήσεις aboutthem και μαθαίνει να εκτελεί μερικά 
tricksthemselves</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad en línea del Internet para los 
estudiantes ingleses del intermmediate, donde el estudiante aprende 
cómo a haga los trucos mágicos, contesta al aboutthem de las 
preguntas y aprende realizar algunos tricksthemselves</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrungsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magie</string>
          </keyword>
